logon instructions:
Расширению Friend Manager необходимо првязать лицензию к Вашей учетной записи.
После входа, выбранный Вами провайдер передаст расширению Friend
Manager Ваш email адрес, но не пароль или другие персональные данные
prior 2013 buyers info: Если Вы приобретали подписку до 1 августа 2013, то Вы входили через Google
FM not affiliated with fb or google: расширение Friend Manager никак не связано с Facebook или Google
upgrade to pro: Upgrade to the Professional version of Friend Manager's Invite All Friends Extension
features:
For a one time fee of $%d %s, once activated your extension will automatically scroll and
select all of your friends in just one click. No more carpal tunnel, no more hours and hours spent clicking!
don't delay: Don't delay, get your license today!
if you having trouble:
If you are having trouble activating your license and keep geting prompted for payment, there is a possibility something
on your computer is blocking activation. Please disable any security software or pop-up blockers.
support link: Still having trouble? Click here for support.
